Returns the y-axis of the node, represented as a normalized vector defined in the world coordinate system.

zClippingCoefficient() - Method in class nub.core.Graph
Returns the coefficient used to position the near and far clipping planes.
zFar() - Method in class nub.core.Graph
Returns the far clipping plane distance used by the eye node Node#projection(Type, float, float, float, float, boolean) matrix in world units.
zNear() - Method in class nub.core.Graph
Returns the near clipping plane distance used by the eye node Node#projection(Type, float, float, float, float, boolean) matrix in world units.
zNearCoefficient() - Method in class nub.core.Graph
Returns the coefficient used to set Graph.zNear() when the Graph.eye() is inside the ball defined by Graph.center() and Graph.zClippingCoefficient() * Graph.radius().
